skill.Spooky.name: Scaring
skill.Spooky.perk.level_3: Universal Neutrals added to the loot table.
skill.Spooky.perk.level_6: Universal Likes added to the loot table.
Spooky5a.name: Ghost
Spooky5a.desc: Direction does not affect scare chance
Spooky5b.name: Zombie
Spooky5b.desc: Chance to not loose friendship when scaring
Spooky10a1.name: Banshee
Spooky10a1.desc: Can scare multiple people around you at once.
Spooky10a2.name: Wraith
Spooky10a2.desc: Gain Life and Stamina when you scare
Spooky10b1.name: Vampire
Spooky10b1.desc: Chance to get better items from scaring
Spooky10b2.name: Ghoul
skill.Thief.name: Thieving
skill.Thief.perk.level_3: Universal Neutrals added to the loot table.
skill.Thief.perk.level_6: Universal Likes added to the loot table.
Thief5a.name: Pickpocket
Thief5a.desc: Direction does not affect scare chance
Thief5b.name: Robin Hood
Thief5b.desc: Chance to not loose friendship when stealing
Thief10a1.name: Highwayman
Thief10a1.desc: Can steal from multiple people around you at once.
Thief10a2.name: Mugger
Thief10a2.desc: Gain Life and Stamina when you steal
Thief10b1.name: Phantom
Thief10b1.desc: Chance to get better items from stealing
Thief10b2.name: Rogue
moonslime.Spooky.Cooldown.Thieving.apply: You can't steal for a bit after your last attempt.
moonslime.Spooky.Cooldown.Scaring.apply: You can't scare for a bit after your last attempt
moonslime.Spooky.Cooldown.Thieving.on_co: You can not steal right now.
moonslime.Spooky.Cooldown.Scaring.on_coo: You can not scare right now.
moonslime.Spooky.Cooldown.Thieving.off_c: You can attempt to steal again.
moonslime.Spooky.Cooldown.Scaring.off_co: You can attempt to scare again.
config.DeScary.tooltip:
Changes the Scaring Skill and theme to that of Thieving.
THIS REQUIRES A RESTART TO WORK.
DO NOT DO THIS MID SAVE AFTER YOU PLAYED FOR A BIT.
The theiving professions and scary professions have different IDs
config.ThiefIcon.tooltip:
Changes the icon of the thief skill on the skill page. 
THIS REQUIRES A RESTART TO WORK. 
 This option only works if Descary is set to true.
config.Key_Cast.tooltip: Press this key to scare/steal NPCs when near them.
config.ExpMod.tooltip: This will change how much exp all other options are multiplied by
config.ExpFromFail.tooltip: If you fail at Scaring/Stealing, you will get this much exp.
config.ExpLevel1.tooltip: How much exp you get at a tier 1 success
config.ExpLevel2.tooltip: How much exp you get at a tier 2 success
config.ExpLevel3.tooltip: How much exp you get at a tier 3 success
config.ExpLevel4.tooltip: How much exp you get at a tier 4 success
